Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters that govern decals.

dmypolyId.Wiki: Dummy polygon ID for decal generation. If specified by TAE, it will be the value of TAE.

pitchAngle.Wiki: The reference angle offset (up and down). In degrees

yawAngle.Wiki: The reference angle offset (left and right). In degrees

nearDistance.Wiki: Decal placement near distance. In metres.

farDistance.Wiki: Decal placement far distance. In metres.

nearSize.Wiki: Size at the near distance. In metres.

farSize.Wiki: Size at the far distance. In metres.

maskSpeffectId.Wiki: If SpEffect ID is not -1, then decal is only applied if the specified SpEffect is present.

replaceTextureId_byMaterial.Wiki: When generated by an attack hit, change the texture depending on the defense material in 1.\nNew texture ID = blood material ID * 10000000 + original texture ID

dmypolyCategory.Wiki: Where to search for the dummy polygon ID.

useDeferredDecal.Wiki: If ON, acts as a deferred decal.

usePaintDecal.Wiki: If ON, acts as a paint decal.

bloodTypeEnable.Wiki: Affected by optional blood decal, ID +1000 in mild, cannot be pasted if hidden.

bUseNormal.Wiki: If ON, use normal mask (supports normal and shininess texture).

usePom.Wiki: If ON, use parallel occlusion mapping.

putVertical.Wiki: Enable if the decal is to be placed vertically.

randomSizeMin.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the minimum scale it can be randomly placed at.

randomSizeMax.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the minimum scale it can be randomly placed at.

randomRollMin.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the minimum roll angle it can be randomly placed at. In degrees.

randomRollMax.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the maximum roll angle it can be randomly placed at. In degrees.

randomPitchMin.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the minimum pitch angle it can be randomly placed at. In degrees.

randomPitchMax.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the maximum pitch angle it can be randomly placed at. In degrees.

randomYawMin.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the minimum yaw angle it can be randomly placed at. In degrees.

randomYawMax.Wiki: When placing the decal, what is the maximum yaw angle it can be randomly placed at. In degrees.

pomHightScale.Wiki: The height scale to use with parallel occlusion mapping.

pomSampleMin.Wiki: The minimum sample count to use with parallel occlusion mapping.

pomSampleMax.Wiki: The maximum sample count to use with parallel occlusion mapping.

blendMode.Wiki: Blend mode to use for this decal.

appearDirType.Wiki: Reference coordinates that determine the direction in which the decal will fly.

emissiveValueBegin.Wiki: The start value used in the emissive mask.

emissiveValueEnd.Wiki: The end value used in the emissive mask.

emissiveTime.Wiki: The interpolation time from start value to end value.

bIntpEnable.Wiki: Do you generate at the time when the bar is extended due to the decal generation via TAE?

bIntpEnable_forTank.Wiki: Do you generate at the time when the bar is extended due to the decal generation via TAE?

intpIntervalDist.Wiki: Distance to interpolate decals generated between TAE bars when interpolation is enabled. In metres.

beginIntpTextureId.Wiki: Texture ID at the start of interpolation (-1 uses textureID).

endIntpTextureId.Wiki: Texture at the end of interpolation Texture ID (-1 uses textureID).

appearSfxId.Wiki: SFXID issued when the decal is placed (-1 means none).

appearSfxOffsetPos.Wiki: Offset distance applied to the SFX generation position

maskScale.Wiki: Mask strength (currently valid only with deferred decals)

lifeTimeSec.Wiki: The duration of the decal after placement. In seconds.

fadeOutTimeSec.Wiki: Fade out time for the decal. In seconds.

priority.Wiki: Decals with a priority higher than others will stay over lower priorities. (-1 does not disappear)

bDistThinOutEnable.Wiki: Whether to thin out nearby decals after placement.

bAlignedTexRandomVariationEnable.Wiki: If ON, one variation number randomly determined for each texture other than 0 will be applied. The number of non-zero variations must be the same.

distThinOutCheckDist.Wiki: The distance at which decals are checked and subsequently thinned-out.

distThinOutCheckAngleDeg.Wiki: The angle from the placed decal at which decals are checked and subsequently thinned-out.

distThinOutMaxNum.Wiki: If the angle is greater than or equal to this number, thin out

distThinOutCheckNum.Wiki: How many recent items should be checked for thinning?

delayAppearFrame.Wiki: When trying to apply a decal, it actually gets applied after this frame. Based on 30 FPS.

randVaria_Diffuse.Wiki: Number of random variations of albedo texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Mask.Wiki: Number of random variations of mask texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Reflec.Wiki: Number of random variations of reflectance textures (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Normal.Wiki: Number of random variations of normal texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Height.Wiki: Number of random variations of displacement texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Emissive.Wiki: Number of random variations of emissive textures (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

fadeInTimeSec.Wiki: Fade in time for the decal. In seconds.

thinOutOverlapMultiRadius.Wiki: Determine if it is a duplicate within the range of decal size multiplied by this value

thinOutNeighborAddRadius.Wiki: Determine if it is nearby based on the decal size plus this distance. In metres.

thinOutOverlapLimitNum.Wiki: The number of decals that can be duplicated within the overlap radius.

thinOutNeighborLimitNum.Wiki: The number of decals that can be duplicated within the neighbor radius.

maxDecalSfxCreatableSlopeAngleDeg.AltName: Decal Particle: Upper Angle Limit for Generation
maxDecalSfxCreatableSlopeAngleDeg.Wiki: The maximum angle limit when generating the decal particle.

appearAssetId.Wiki: The asset to generate when the decal is placed.

assetPitchAngleDeg.Wiki: Random placement for the asset. The reference angle offset (up and down). In degrees

assetYawAngleDeg.Wiki: Random placement for the asset. The reference angle offset (up and down). In degrees

assetMinAppearTimeSec.Wiki: Random placement for the asset. The minimum time the generated asset is displayed for. In seconds.

assetMaxAppearTimeSec.Wiki: Random placement for the asset. The maximum time the generated asset is displayed for. In seconds.

assetMinFadeTimeSec.Wiki: Random placement for the asset. The minimum time the generated asset is faded by. In seconds.

assetMaxFadeTimeSec.Wiki: Random placement for the asset. The maximum time the generated asset is faded by. In seconds.

assetMinAnimId.Wiki: Random playback will be performed from animations with IDs between the lower limit and above and the upper limit. If the upper limit is -1, try to play the animation for this item.

assetMaxAnimId.Wiki: Random playback will be performed from animations with IDs between the lower limit and above and the upper limit. If the lower limit is -1, try to play the animation for this item.

refParamId.Wiki: ID of decal to reference (if -1, other entered number will be used).
